page.title: 20DOMESDAY TEAM
page.content: The team which has prepared the information for grid ref.04280261 was from Coten End Middle School,Warwick. Children from the school were taken from all four year groups.1st yr.David Milsom,Victoria Bolton,Warren Ham and Karen Olorenshaw.2nd yr.Philippa Noel, Ian Turner,Hazel Olorenshaw and Nathan Fletcher.3rd yr.Rowan Wright, Andrew Leyland,Jane Wildsmith and Andrew Jackson.4th yr.Clare Simmons,Darren Sargent,Anne Harwood and Graham Bolam. The teachers concerned with the project were Mr P.Morrell(Acting Head) and Mr P.Townsend(class teacher). Thanks is due to teachers and staff of Bishop's Tachbrook Middle School for their hospitality,to local farmers and local council offices for helpful information received from them.
